display.name: Instant Query Rate
display.description: Shows rate of incoming instant query (/query) requests.

display.name: Instant Query Errors
display.description: Shows percentage of errors for incoming instant query (/query) requests.

spec.query:
(
      sum by (namespace, job, code) (
        rate(http_requests_total{code=~"5..",handler="query",job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
    / ignoring (code) group_left ()
      sum by (namespace, job) (
        rate(http_requests_total{handler="query",job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
      )
  )
*
  100

display.name: Instant Query Duration
display.description: Duration percentiles of successful instant query (/query) requests.

display.name: Range Query Rate
display.description: Shows rate of incoming range query (/query_range) requests.

display.name: Range Query Errors
display.description: Shows percentage of errors for incoming range query (/query_range) requests.

display.name: Range Query Duration
display.description: Duration percentiles of successful range query (/query_range) requests.

display.name: Unary gRPC Read request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Available Concurrent Capacity
display.description: Shows available capacity of queriers to process concurrent queries in parallel.

spec.query:
max_over_time(
    thanos_query_concurrent_gate_queries_max{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
  )
-
  avg_over_time(
    thanos_query_concurrent_gate_queries_in_flight{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
  )

display.name: DNS Lookups
display.description: Shows the rate of DNS lookups to discover StoreAPI endpoints.

display.name: DNS Lookups Errors
display.description: Shows the percentage of failures compared to total number of executed DNS lookups.

spec.query:
sum by (namespace, job) (
    rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_failures_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
/
  sum by (namespace, job) (
    rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_lookups_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )

display.name: CPU Usage
display.description: Shows the CPU usage of the component.

spec.query: rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])

display.name: Memory Usage
display.description: Shows various memory usage metrics of the component.

spec.query: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
process_resident_memory_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}

display.name: Goroutines
display.description: Shows the number of goroutines being used by the component.

spec.query: go_goroutines{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}

display.name: GC Duration
display.description: Shows the Go garbage collection pause durations for the component.

spec.query: go_gc_duration_seconds{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
